rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with eco-friendly materials and natural lighting to create an inviting first impression.
An open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow abundant natural light, complemented by energy-efficient LED fixtures and sustainable furniture.
A modest dining space adjacent to the kitchen, using local materials and Vastu-aligned placement for harmony and balance.
An eco-friendly kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances, natural lighting, and open shelving to optimize space on a tight budget.
A small guest room utilizing reclaimed wood finishes and local craftsmanship, in compliance with Vastu for health and prosperity.

openings.description: The main entrance door facing the northeast to invite positive energy as per Vastu, constructed using recycled materials.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room to maximize natural light and provide a sense of openness.
A secondary door that connects to outdoor spaces, aligned with local building codes for safety.

rooms.description: The master bedroom includes ample natural light through strategically placed windows and eco-friendly insulation, oriented according to Vastu guidelines for restful energy.
A dedicated home office space featuring sustainable built-in storage, ergonomic design, and enhanced natural lighting to boost productivity within budget constraints.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in the master bedroom and home office for optimal daylighting while maintaining privacy and energy efficiency.
A safe, compact staircase connecting levels, designed with non-slip eco-friendly materials to comply with safety norms.
